description: To address CVE-2023-24023, administrators should apply a series of security updates across affected systems. For Windows 11 version 23H2 for x64-based systems, apply KB5032190 by accessing the update package at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190. For Windows 10 version 22H2 on x64-based systems, KB5032189 should be installed, available at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189. Additionally, ensure Windows Server 2022 is updated with KB5032202 through the link https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032202. Systems running older builds, such as Windows 10 version 21H2 for x64-based should also receive KB5032196 via https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032196. Each of these updates mitigates the risks associated with Bluetooth vulnerabilities and should be deployed as soon as possible to ensure system integrity.
